channel.title: U4 - Legislation and Regulatory Requirements on
channel.description: Recent content in U4 - Legislation and Regulatory Requirements on

item.description: Go back home: [[⭐ Main ⭐]] Finished / Incomplete 4.1.1 - Health and safety when working with computers Display screen regulations The Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992 is the main piece of UK legislation that covers the use of display screen equipment, including computers, in the workplace.

Go back home: [[⭐ Main ⭐]] Finished / Incomplete 4.2.1 - Understand the purpose and role of codes of conduct produced by professional bodies for the use of digital British Computer Society (BCS) Code of Conduct A code of conduct is aset of guidelines that outlines the expected behavior of members of a particular organization or professional body.
